Class ValuesArray

java.lang.Object
  ValuesArray

public class ValuesArray
extends java.lang.Object

Class ValuesArray - represents an array of randomly generated double values; after construction, values cannot be modified, added, or removed. Objects may only change their position in the array

Version:
v1.0.0
Author:
Liam Geyer

Constructor Detail

ValuesArray

public ValuesArray(int quantity,
                   int maxValue)
Sole constructor. Creates a double array of quantity values, all with a random value between 0 and maxValue

Parameters:
quantity - size of the array of values
maxValue - maximum value of an item in the array
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the quantity or size is less than or equal to 0
